readable.content: A little boy with a dirty face lays on a colorful rug . A little boy with a messy face sitting on a colorful blanket . little boy in red shirt and gray shorts with messy face The little boy is laying back relaxing on the colorful blanket . There is a little boy in a red shirt and a dirty face and he is smiling .
